name: C9: Continent of the Ninth Seal
name_original: C9: Continent of the Ninth Seal
description:
C9: Continent of the Ninth Seal is an action-RPG massively multiplayer game developed by Webzen. It came out on 13-09-2012. Webzen published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
C9: Continent of the Ninth Seal is available on PC.
